rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)[/i]
This land enters tapped.
{X}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact land: Put a stun counter on each of up to X target tapped creatures. Activate only if you control a creature with 4 toughness or greater.
flavor_text: [i]It's not about having the strength to ring it, but the spirit to endure it.[/i]
